channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [JDK-8342555] Repeated call of StringBuffer.reverse with double byte string returns wrong result
item.summary: Repeated call of StringBuffer.reverse with double byte string returns wrong result

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
